author: Christophe Baudet
comment: Gets you access you all your wear apps quickly. I have not paid for the double tap feature as I am trying out all the launchers at present, but if the double tap feature is reliable then this is a solid, simple launcher - no shortcut settings no bloated features, just quicker access to your apps in a scrollable window. The persistent notification isn't really ideal, so you have to pay if you want to use this app properly, but it seems very reasonable to do so from my short evaluation.
title: Very good

author: TJ Kelly Jr
comment: Great app, only wish it had the ability to hide apps that I don't want to see and set apps as favorites so they will be at the top!!!
title: Like it

author: Tracey Janke
comment: Really easy to use.  Developer gave work around for notification issue.  Best launcher to date for wear
title: Excellent

author: Joshua Walters
comment: I like it, but I dont care for the persistent notification. I have "Notification" off in the settings, but it still shows.

reply.author: FIRE APPZ --------------------------------(akware)
reply.content: Hi Joshua, we are working on fixing the bug. For now, you can just swipe all the way to the left on the card and click dismiss, and then it will not show up anymore

title: Good, but not perfect

author: Andy Stephen
comment: Developer has replied about the persistent notification which is great, really appreciate it, 5 stars in advance.

reply.author: FIRE APPZ --------------------------------(akware)
reply.content: Hi Andy, we are working on fixing the bug. For now, you can just swipe all the way to the left on the card and click dismiss, and then it will not show up anymore

title: Great in principle

author: Jay S Brindle
comment: Could do with a restore button for if you already bought the in app upgrade.
title: Good app but...

author: Cory Cone
comment: Need to be able to hide apps and change background colour to black. Good start!
